


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.color -->

# ```js hex2rgba ```


Hex to RGBA

## Parameters

- **hex**  String: The hex string to convert



## Example (js)

```js
import hex2rgba from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/color/hex2rgba';
hex2rgba('#ff00ff');
```
